column4: hi, i am trying to install 9.04 server onto a viglen mpc-l - have jumped a few hoops so far but stuck atm because the partitioner has a blank line where i guess the "partition me" option should be
Popey, i don't think it's those issues, i have got past the acpi and pnp bits
no, the pata_cs5535 is the issue where it cant find the disk
i will go read more, ta
no problem jammeh, i filed that bug, and you're the second today to ask about it :)
i had thought from http://appleby.is-a-geek.net/mpcl/index.html that if i was installing jaunty i would have been ok :(
he links to the bug at the bottom :)
but also says the Jaunty kernel has all the required drivers?
the latest one does, but not the one thats on the original jaunty cd
anyhow, i will move on from that and wonder what my best install option is to work around it?
i explained on the wiki page how to work around it
